title: oh my god
review: why oh why was this film made. the original was a poor film. the Vinnie Jones remake was a bad film. and the remake of the remake is so poor it is scary.once again money has taken over from artistic integrity, but then what did i expect from Adam Sandler and Chris Rockplease please please have some bloody originality and stop churning out the same old tripesurely there must be some people in America (hell the whole of the Western world) that are coming up with some new fresh ideas, but then maybe i am expecting to much
